|brand = Buffalo |model = WXR-11000 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = XE12 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 5 June 2023 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Buffalo_WXR-11000XE12 |wlclass = AXE11000 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4916; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARMv8 |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-B53 |cpu1spd = 2.6 GHz <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Broadcom;BCM84891; |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 2 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |lan2_ports = 1 |lan2_speed = 10GbE |totlan = 3 |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.2 (Gen 1) |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 19 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.42 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6, WPA3, 1024QAM, MU-MIMO, HE160 |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->

|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->

|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM6715; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |axqam2 = <!-- AX-qam --> |rad2ax = 4804 |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi3_if_name = |rad3chip1 = Broadcom;BCM6715; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad3txchains = 4 |rad3rxchains = 4 |rad3sstreams = 4 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |axqam3 = <!-- AX-qam --> |rad3ax = 4804 |acqam3 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad3ac = 1733 |rad3n = 600 |rad3a = 54 |rad3freq = 6 |rad3correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad3cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *{{WiFiCert|WFA120644|08/02/2023}} :AirStation WXR-11000XE12 • HW: 1.00 • FW: 3.00
==Links of Interest== *[https://24wireless.info/buffalo-wxr-11000xe12 ''Buffalo WXR-11000XE12'' on '''24|Wireless'''] (JP) *[https://24wireless.info/list-of-11ax-routers ''List of WiFi 6 Routers'' on '''24|Wireless'''] • [https://24wireless.info/wifi6-router-compare Compare]
===Models=== :;[[Buffalo]] • [[List of Buffalo Devices - Wireless Routers]] • [https://24wireless.info/buffalo-ap-supports-wpa3-officially WPA3] *[[Buffalo WXR-11000XE12]] • ''AirStation'' WXR-11000XE12 (Router) *[[Buffalo WXR-6000AX12]] (P/S/B) • ''AirStation'' WXR-6000AX12 *[[Buffalo WXR-5950AX12]] • WFA91286 (2019/10) *[[Buffalo WXR-5950AX12R]] • WFA91983 (2019/10) *[[Buffalo WXR-5700AX7S]] • WFA99794 (2020/08) *[[Buffalo WSR-5400AX6]] • WFA97540 (2020/07) *[[Buffalo WNR-5400XE6]] • AXE5400 *[[Buffalo WSR-3200AX4S]] • WFA100497 (2020/11) *[[Buffalo WSR-1800AX4]] • WFA97581 (2020/07)
==See also== :;[[List of 802.11ax Hardware]] • [[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]] *[[Arris SURFboard mAX Pro (W31)]] (AX11000) • [https://www.amazon.com/ARRIS-Surfboard-Pro-AX11000-W31/dp/B07M8TZ1KM/ B07M8TZ1KM] :[https://www.arris.com/surfboard/products/max-mesh-wi-fi-system/ax11000/ AX11000 SURFboard mAX Pro Mesh Wi-Fi 6 System] *[[Arris SURFboard mAX Plus (W130)]] (AX7800) • [https://www.amazon.com/ARRIS-Surfboard-Plus-AX7800-Router/dp/B07MD414J4/ B07MD414J4] :[https://www.arris.com/surfboard/products/max-mesh-wi-fi-system/ax7800/ AX7800 SURFboard mAX Plus Mesh Wi-Fi 6 System] *[[Arris SURFboard mAX]] (AX6600) • [https://24wireless.info/list-of-11ax-routers 24W] :[https://www.arris.com/surfboard/products/max-mesh-wi-fi-system/ax6600/ AX6600 SURFboard mAX Mesh Wi-Fi 6 System] *[[Edimax BR-6473AX]] (BR3000/AX3000) • [[Intel (Lantiq)]] WAV654 • [https://24wireless.info/list-of-11ax-routers 24W] • [https://www.edimax.com/edimax/post/post/data/edimax/global/press_releases/4440 PR] *[[Juplink RX4-1500]] (AX1500) • [https://www.juplink.com/products/juplink-wifi-6-router-ax1500-dual-band-ax-wifi-router?variant=31072421806176 PPage] • [https://www.amazon.com/Next-Gen-Supporting-Technology-4xGigabit-Streaming/dp/B07X9K1N2N/ B07X9K1N2N] :• [[Juplink RX4-1800]] • [[Juplink EC4-1200]] - Wi-Fi 6 Router :• [[Juplink EX4-1800]] • [[Juplink EX7-3000]] - Wi-Fi 6 Extender
